name: minus

effect.x-y: Powers up only when paired with plus.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Powers up only when paired with plus.

short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

flavor_text.x-y: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
